content: this legal text explains the progress of a cause involving two parties referred to as pe and pg mn the cause involves the division of ownership of two real estate units located in municipality castelfidardo the first unit is an apartment with rooms on the ground floor and first floor and the second unit is also an apartment with rooms on the ground floor and first floor the ownership of the units is divided between pe and pg mn based on specified shares which are provided in the text along with the cadastral data and values the text also mentions the legal requirements and regulations related to the construction and division of the building both parties agree to end the existing coownership and divide the assets accordingly with each party receiving their respective shares based on the real estate units the cadastral data and values of each share are reiterated the text concludes with some omissions
